head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CARRINGTON, HARCOURT AINSLIE

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CARRINGTON, HARCOURT AINSLIE

block.p: CARRINGTON-Harcourt Ainslie, Ph.D. Professor Emeritus, CUNY, and Psychologist. Adored husband & best friend of Bette Kerr; father of Harcourt M. (Robin); grandfather of Renee and of Anthony (Kirkland); brother of Madaline (Slater), Jackye (Cooper), and Lawrence Carrington. Dignity, courage and integrity pervaded your life. Your wisdom and love continue to guide a legion of family and friends. Memorial service Saturday, November 4th, 12:00 noon, St Paul's Chapel, Columbia University.

(Robin); grandfather of Renee and of Anthony (Kirkland); brother of Madaline (Slater), Jackye (Cooper), and Lawrence Carrington. Dignity, courage and integrity pervaded your life. Your wisdom and love continue to guide a legion of family and friends. Memorial service Saturday, November 4th, 12:00 noon, St Paul's Chapel, Columbia University.
